Detailed Description

The TextPackConnector provides functionality for accessing the data of a text pack.

Member Function Documentation

static BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::ContainsLanguage (  EntryId  id  )  [static]
 

Returns TRUE if the text pack contains the language with the id handed over in parameter id.

EntryId TextPackConnector::GetActiveLanguageId (   )  [static]
 

Returns the id of the active language.

INT32 TextPackConnector::GetIndexOfActiveLanguage (   )  [static]
 

Returns the index of the active language.

INT32 TextPackConnector::GetIndexOfLanguage (  const AcacLanguage *  language  )  [static]
 

Returns the index of the language handed over in parameter lang.

Parameters:
lang Language to get the index of.
Returns:
-1 if not found, otherwise the index of the language in the Text Pack.

const AcacLanguage * TextPackConnector::GetLanguage (  EntryId  id  )  [static]
 

Returns the language with the id handed over in parameter id.

const AcacLanguage * TextPackConnector::GetLanguageAt (  UINT16  index  )  [static]
 

Returns the language at position index in the text pack.

BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::GetLanguageNames (  const WCHAR **  language_names,
UINT32  size
)  [static]
 

Fills the array handed over by the caller with the names of the languages.

Parameters:
language_names Array where to write the names of the languages.

static const AcacLanguage** TextPackConnector::GetLanguages (   )  [static]
 

Returns pointers to the languages available in the text pack.

UINT16 TextPackConnector::GetNumberOfLanguages (   )  [static]
 

Returns the number of languages that are available in the customization pack.

const WCHAR * TextPackConnector::GetText (  UINT16  index  )  [static]
 

Returns the text of the active language at position index.

void TextPackConnector::Init (   )  [static]
 

Initializes the TextPackConnector. The default language is set to english.

BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::IsTextPackAvailable (   )  [static]
 

Returns true if a text pack is available in the customization pack.

BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::SetActiveLanguage (  const AcacLanguage *  lang  )  [static]
 

Sets the active language to the language handed over in parameter lang.

Parameters:
lang Language that shall be set active.
Returns:
TRUE if the language given in the parameter has been set active.

BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::SetActiveLanguage (  EntryId  id  )  [static]
 

Sets the active language to the language which has the id equal to the parameter id.

Parameters:
id Id of the language that shall be set active.
Returns:
TRUE if the active language has the id given in parameter id.

BOOLEAN TextPackConnector::SetActiveLanguageByIndex (  UINT16  index  )  [static]
 

Sets the active language to the language available at position idx.

Parameters:
idx Index of the language to set active.
Returns:
TRUE if the language at position idx has been set active.
